name: Penguin Dash (Uppermost)
description:
Penguin Dash is about a penguin who wants to find the so called GOLDEN FISH, which is a legendary fish that have an awesome taste!

It is a hard game, not that hard, but hard... you know?
Spikes on the roof, spikes on the floor, rain of spikes, boost through the skies and eat a lot of fishes in your way
Try your skills and help Penguin Dash find the fish of his life!
